name: Draconic Bloodline
description: Your innate magic stems from draconic ancestry, manifesting in tough scales and elemental power.

1.name: Dragon Ancestor
1.description: Choose a type of dragon as your ancestor; you learn Draconic and double your proficiency on Charisma checks with dragons.

1.name: Draconic Resilience
1.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1 per sorcerer level, and when not wearing armor your AC equals 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

6.name: Elemental Affinity
6.description: When you cast a spell that deals damage of your ancestor's type, add your Charisma modifier to one damage roll and spend 1 sorcery point to gain resistance to that damage for 1 hour.

14.name: Dragon Wings
14.description: As a bonus action, sprout dragon wings to gain a flying speed equal to your speed. They disappear at your command.

18.name: Draconic Presence
18.description: Spend 5 sorcery points as an action to exude an aura of awe or fear in a 60-foot radius for 1 minute.

choices.name: Dragon Ancestor
choices.description: Select the type of dragon whose magic infuses you.
